mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into apartment (apartment_name, address, official_phone, official_mail, description, floor_number, number_of_rooms, number_of_bedrooms, number_of_bathrooms, number_of_public_rooms, floor_space, maximum_rent, create_date, start_date, status, create_time) values (#{apartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officialPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officialMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floorNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numberOfRooms,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numberOfBedrooms,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numberOfBathrooms,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numberOfPublicRooms,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floorSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maximumRent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update apartment set apartment_name = #{apartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, official_phone = #{officialPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, official_mail = #{officialMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, floor_number = #{floorNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number_of_rooms = #{numberOfRooms,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number_of_bedrooms = #{numberOfBedrooms,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number_of_bathrooms = #{numberOfBathrooms,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number_of_public_rooms = #{numberOfPublicRooms,jdbcType=INTEGER}, floor_space = #{floorSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maximum_rent = #{maximumRent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, apartment_name, address, official_phone, official_mail, description, floor_number, number_of_rooms, number_of_bedrooms, number_of_bathrooms, number_of_public_rooms, floor_space, maximum_rent, create_date, start_date, status, create_time from apartment where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, apartment_name, address, official_phone, official_mail, description, floor_number, number_of_rooms, number_of_bedrooms, number_of_bathrooms, number_of_public_rooms, floor_space, maximum_rent, create_date, start_date, status, create_time from apartment
